Package clap

Class SimpleArgument

java.lang.Object
clap.SimpleArgument
Direct Known Subclasses:
IntegerArgument, StringArgument
public class SimpleArgument extends Object
The parent of possible arguments encapsulates common properties and works as a parameterless argument.
